com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.appframework

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.appframework.Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object

    This class defines several different parameters to setup the library's behaviour.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Config

        public Config()
        Default constructor

      • Config

        public Config(java.lang.String label,
              boolean json,
              boolean secure,
              int serverPort,
              short nbThreadBt,
              short nbThreadWifi,
              boolean reliableTransportWifi,
              boolean connectionFlooding)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        label - a String value which represents the unique identifier of a mobile node.
        json - a boolean value to use json or bytes in network transfer. It is true if json is used. Otherwise, byte streams are used.
        secure - a boolean value to determine if the Bluetooth connection is secure. It is true if the connection is secured (ciphered). Otherwise, the connection is not secured.
        serverPort - an integer value to set the listening port number (for Wi-Fi).
        nbThreadBt - a short value to determine the number of threads managed by the Bluetooth server.
        nbThreadWifi - a short value to determine the number of threads managed by the Wi-Fi server.
        reliableTransportWifi - a boolean value to use TCP or UDP in network transfer for Wi-Fi. It is true if TCP is used. Otherwise, UDP is used.
        connectionFlooding - a boolean value to use network discovery. It allows to discover the neighbours of the direct neighbours. It is true if discovery is used. Otherwise, discovery is not used.

      • Config

        public Config(boolean secure,
              int nbThreadBt)
       throws MaxThreadReachedException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        secure - a boolean value to determine if the Bluetooth connection is secure. It is true if the connection is secured (ciphered).
        nbThreadBt - a short value to determine the number of threads managed by the Bluetooth server.
        Throws:
        MaxThreadReachedException - signals that the maximum number of threads is reached (7 for Bluetooth and not defined for Wi-Fi).

      • Config

        public Config(int serverPort,
              int nbThreadWifi)
       throws BadServerPortException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        serverPort - an integer value to set the listening port number (for Wi-Fi).
        nbThreadWifi - a short value to determine the number of threads managed by the Wi-Fi server.
        Throws:
        BadServerPortException - signals that the listening port for Wi-Fi server is incorrect. It must be between 1024 and 65534.

      • Config

        public Config(int serverPort,
              int nbThreadWifi,
              boolean reliableTransportWifi)
       throws BadServerPortException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        serverPort - an integer value to set the listening port number (for Wi-Fi).
        nbThreadWifi - a short value to determine the number of threads managed by the Wi-Fi server.
        reliableTransportWifi - a boolean value to use TCP or UDP in network transfer for Wi-Fi. It is true if TCP is used. Otherwise, UDP is used.
        Throws:
        BadServerPortException - signals that the listening port for Wi-Fi server is incorrect. It must be between 1024 and 65534.

      • isConnectionFlooding

        public boolean isConnectionFlooding()
        Method allowing to know if the connectionFlooding flag is set.
        Returns:
        a boolean value to use network discovery. It allows to discover the neighbours of the direct neighbours. It is true if discovery is used. Otherwise, discovery is not used.

      • isReliableTransportWifi

        public boolean isReliableTransportWifi()
        Method allowing to know if the reliableTransportWifi flag is set.
        Returns:
        a boolean value to use TCP or UDP in network transfer for Wi-Fi. It is true if TCP is used. Otherwise, UDP is used.

      • isSecure

        public boolean isSecure()
        Method allowing to know if the secure flag is set.
        Returns:
        a boolean value to determine if the Bluetooth connection is secure. It is true if the connection is secured (ciphered). Otherwise, the connection is not secured.

        public void setTimeout(int timeout)
        Method allowing to set the timeout (in seconds) for Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connection.

      • setServerPort

        public void setServerPort(int serverPort)
                   throws BadServerPortException
        Method allowing to set the listening port number (for Wi-Fi).
        Parameters:
        serverPort - an integer value which represents the listening port number (for Wi-Fi).
        Throws:
        BadServerPortException - signals that the listening port for Wi-Fi server is incorrect. It must be between 1024 and 65534.

      • setNbThreadBt

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        MaxThreadReachedException - signals that the maximum number of threads is reached (7 for Bluetooth and not defined for Wi-Fi).
